local_intent: Perceive the white_plate (with retry), execute ApproachAndAlign to 0.005 tolerance, and verify arrival at the target.
assumptions: white_plate is visible and within reach
camera-to-base transform and robot kinematics are calibrated
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT step to detect and align to the white plate before grasping; preserves timeouts and tolerance from the global plan.
